mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_trade (board_id, trade_price, trade_category) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{tradePrice}, #{tradeCategory});
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, b.user_id as userId, b.board_type as boardType, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.report_count as reportCount, b.click_count as clickCount, b.local_si as localSi, b.local_gu as localGu, b.reg_date as regDate, b.`update` as `update`, t.board_trade_id as boardTradeId, t.trade_price as tradePrice, t.trade_category as tradeCategory, u.nickname as nickname FROM board AS b JOIN board_trade AS t ON b.board_id = t.board_id JOIN user AS u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_type = 2

SELECT b.board_id as boardId, b.user_id as userId, b.board_type as boardType, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.report_count as reportCount, b.click_count as clickCount, b.local_si as localSi, b.local_gu as localGu, b.reg_date as regDate, b.`update` as `update`, t.board_trade_id as boardTradeId, t.trade_price as tradePrice, t.trade_category as tradeCategory, u.nickname as nickname FROM board AS b JOIN board_trade AS t ON b.board_id = t.board_id JOIN user AS u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_type = 2 AND b.board_id = #{id}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.user_id AS userId, b.board_type AS boardType, b.title AS title, b.content AS content, b.report_count AS reportCount, b.click_count AS clickCount, b.local_si AS localSi, b.local_gu AS localGu, b.reg_date AS regDate, b.`update` AS `update`, t.board_trade_id AS boardTradeId, t.trade_category AS tradeCategory, t.price AS price, t.product_status AS productStatus, t.trade_status AS tradeStatus, u.nickname AS nickname FROM board b JOIN board_trade t ON b.board_id = t.board_id JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.board_type = 2 ORDER BY b.click_count DESC LIMIT 6
mapper.update: UPDATE board AS b JOIN board_trade AS t ON b.board_id = t.board_id SET b.title = #{title}, b.content = #{content}, b.local_si = #{localSi}, b.local_gu = #{localGu}, b.`update` = NOW(), t.trade_price = #{tradePrice}, t.trade_category = #{tradeCategory} WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId};
